My experience

My experience includes my own, personal projects, which were created during my studies and my activeness in an international student organisation, which I belong to.

In this role I used to build and maintance complex websites, implement new technology tools to improve a work performance in the group and create promotional graphics. I gained an opportunity to learn about advanced database aspects and back-end technologies, which is a great addition to my developer skills.

Have you question or want to work together? Just let me know by sending an e-mail on szykonopka@gmail.com
